attributes.action: Let us choose to send children to school/college/university without penalisation
attributes.additional_details:
I want the choice to be able to send my children to school and college and make the catchment school or college responsible for their online learning, attainment and exams. 

Especially if you have vulnerable people in the household.
attributes.background: Parents should be allowed to choose to send their children to educational settings without penalisation and the government should support that decision, as parents we know what is is in our children's best interest. During the current pandemic and if cases continue to rise.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065
